name: Heather VanCura
title: Director and Chairperson
bio: Heather VanCura is the Director and Chairperson of the JCP Program.  She leads the JCP Executive Committee and the Program Office. In her role she is responsible for the day-to-day nurturing, support, and leadership of the community. She also is an international speaker, mentor and leader or hack days. Heather oversees the JCP.org web site, JSR management, community building, events, marketing, communications, and growth of the membership. She is also a contributor and leader of the community driven Adoption programs. Heather is the Spec Lead of the JCP.Next efforts to evolve the JCP Program, including JSR 387, Streamline the JCP Program, and JSR 364, Broadening JCP Membership. Heather is passionate about Java and developer communities. She enjoys trying new sports and fitness activities in her free time.
